meanings.definition: Modesty or humility in behavior or appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her unassumingness shone through as she quietly helped others.
meanings.sent2: His unassumingness made him a favorite among his peers.
meanings.sent3: The unassumingness of the small flower in the garden made the other flowers jealous.
meanings.sent4: The unassumingness of the old house belied the treasure hidden within.
meanings.sent5: The unassumingness of the young artist's work left a lasting impact on all who viewed it.

meanings.sent1: The unassumingness of his manner put everyone at ease.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated his unassumingness in a world full of show-offs.
meanings.sent3: The unassumingness of the cat pretending not to care about the toy was comical.
meanings.sent4: The unassumingness of the plain rock turned out to be a rare gem.
meanings.sent5: His unassumingness was like a breath of fresh air in the competitive industry.
